msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />You know, I have the exact same <20_2 arg="9" />!But I see you customized yours. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A custom design on a DIY piece You're a real artisan, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Know what? I think I might have the <20_2 arg="9" />same !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />On closer inspection, though, I see now that yours has a different sorta thing goin' on,
<20_2 arg="10" />I think I have the exact same <20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Guess you and I got similar taste in junk, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your Think I've got one almost the same. What is it that's different on yours? Oh, I see! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You used a custom design! That really changes the whole vibe.
<20_2 arg="10" />I do believe that I have the exact <20_2 arg="9" />same .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Guess we're on the same page!
